title: Meredith Grey and Derek Shepherd's Complex Relationship
description: The evolving romantic and professional relationship between Meredith Grey and Derek Shepherd, complicated by their positions at the hospital.

progressions.content: Meredith wakes up after a one-night stand with Derek, only to discover he is her new boss, setting the stage for their complex relationship.

title: Medical Case: Katie Bryce's Aneurysm
description: The interns' first major medical challenge involving the diagnosis and treatment of Katie Bryce's aneurysm.

progressions.content: Meredith and Cristina work together to diagnose Katie Bryce's condition, and Meredith assists Derek in surgery after correctly diagnosing the aneurysm.

title: Cristina Yang's Surgical Ambitions
description: Cristina Yang's relentless drive to excel in surgery and her competitive nature in the hospital environment.

progressions.content: Cristina collaborates with Meredith to diagnose Katie Bryce, showcasing her ambition and competitive spirit.

title: George O'Malley's Struggle with Confidence
description: George O'Malley's journey to overcome his insecurities and find confidence as a surgical intern.

progressions.content: George struggles in surgery, earning the nickname '007' due to his lack of confidence.

title: Izzie Stevens' Quest for Acceptance
description: Izzie Stevens' efforts to prove herself as a competent intern beyond her past as a model.

progressions.content: Izzie begins her journey to integrate into the hospital environment and prove her capabilities.

title: Meredith Grey's Family Legacy and Challenges
description: Meredith Grey's struggle with her mother's legacy and her own identity as a surgeon, compounded by her mother's illness.

progressions.content: Meredith decides not to sell her mother's house and plans to live with fellow interns, while it is revealed that her mother has Alzheimer's disease.

title: Meredith's First Day as a Surgical Intern
description: Meredith Grey's challenging first day as a surgical intern at Seattle Grace Hospital.

progressions.content: Meredith starts her first day at Seattle Grace, meets fellow interns, and navigates the challenges of her new role. She successfully diagnoses a patient, impressing her superiors.

title: Cristina Yang and Meredith Grey's Budding Friendship
description: The development of a strong friendship between Meredith Grey and Cristina Yang.

progressions.content: Cristina and Meredith bond over their shared experiences as interns and work together on Katie's case, though tension arises when Meredith is chosen for surgery.

title: Ellis Grey's Alzheimer's Revelation
description: Meredith Grey's relationship with her mother, Ellis Grey, and the impact of Ellis's Alzheimer's disease.

progressions.content: Meredith visits her mother, Ellis, revealing her Alzheimer's diagnosis and the emotional complexity of their relationship.
